movie0.Title: Back to the Future
movie0.Plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

movie1.Title: School of Rock
movie1.Plot: After being kicked out of a rock band, Dewey Finn becomes a substitute teacher of a strict elementary private school, only to try and turn it into a rock band.

movie2.Title: Clerks
movie2.Plot: A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.

movie3.Title: Casablanca
movie3.Plot: In Casablanca in December 1941, a cynical American expatriate encounters a former lover, with unforeseen complications.

movie4.Title: Fargo
movie4.Plot: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

movie5.Title: Hidden Figures
movie5.Plot: The story of a team of African-American women mathematicians who served a vital role in NASA during the early years of the US space program.

movie6.Title: Trainspotting
movie6.Plot: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.

movie7.Title: Homeward Bound: The Incredible Journey
movie7.Plot: Three pets escape from a California ranch to find their owners in San Francisco.

movie8.Title: The Silence of the Lambs
movie8.Plot: A young F.B.I. cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer who skins his victims.

movie9.Title: Stand and Deliver
movie9.Plot: The story of Jaime Escalante, a high school teacher who successfully inspired his dropout prone students to learn calculus.
